Container.Name: Torrents Manager
Container.Overview: A simple web application to manage qBittorrent upload settings based on time of day.
Container.Category: Downloaders: MediaApp:Video Productivity: Tools: Other: Status:Stable
Container.ExtraSearchTerms: torrent manager qBittorrent upload schedule automation
Container.Requires: Requires a separate qBittorrent instance. [br] Recommended to run via a cron schedule (e.g. Ofelia)

Config.Name: qBittorrent - URL
Config.Description: URL of the qBittorrent Web UI

Config.Name: qBittorrent - Username
Config.Description: Username for the qBittorrent Web UI

Config.Name: qBittorrent - Password
Config.Description: Password for the qBittorrent Web UI

Config.Name: Schedule - Night Start
Config.Description: Start time for the night schedule (HH:MM format)

Config.Name: Schedule - Night End
Config.Description: End time for the night schedule (HH:MM format)

Config.Name: Schedule - Max Uploads Day
Config.Description: Maximum number of uploads allowed during the day (0 for unlimited)

Config.Name: Schedule - Max Uploads Night
Config.Description: Maximum number of uploads allowed during the night (0 for unlimited)

Config.Name: Data Path
Config.Description: Path to the data directory for Torrents Manager
